enchantment.soulbound.soulbound.desc: Items with this enchantment applied will stay in the players inventory upon death, at the cost of some durability
text.autoconfig.soulbound.option.allowBr: Should durability penalty be able to break items
text.autoconfig.soulbound.option.maxDama: Maximum percentage of durability lost (0 to disable)
text.autoconfig.soulbound.title: SoulBound
